# VEHICLE::TOGGLE_VEHICLE_MOD

## Summary
Toggles a toggle mod on or off. .

## Parameters
* **VEHICLE_INDEX** vehicle
* **MOD_TYPE** modSlot
* **BOOL** toggleOn

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
This can only be used with the toggle mods specified in the enum

Toggles:
UNK17 - 17
Turbo - 18
UNK19 - 19
Tire Smoke - 20
UNK21 - 21
Xenon Headlights - 22
